question: Which of the following is the correct order of weightage for the core sectors in calculation of Index of Industrial Production (IIP)?
explanation:
The Eight Core Industries comprise nearly 38 % of the weight of items included in the Index of Industrial Production (IIP).
On the basis of weightage the arrangement of six core industries in decreasing order is as follows:
Electricity> Steel >Refinery Products> Crude Oil >Coal>Cement >Natural Gas> Fertilizers
